message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not comfortable going as low as $75. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $82.50. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to go up to $80, but no higher. Can you consider that?
